amendment.description: To modify the income threshold used to calculate the refundable portion of the child tax credit.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2652 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 2652 proposed by Senator Lincoln. (consideration: CR S13127-13128; text: CR S13127) To modify the income threshold used to calculate the refundable portion of the child tax credit.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2652 proposed by Senator Lincoln.
